name: NGINX Manager
description: Manages NGINX sites, SSL certificates, and reverse proxies on your VPS. Create sites, configure SSL, and manage your web server through natural conversation.
instructions: Retrieve the full instructions from GET /gpt/instructions on your NGINX Manager API server.

authentication.note: Authentication is not yet enforced. Use any value for now. API key authentication will be added in a future release.

conversation_starters: Set up a new website for example.com with SSL
List all my sites and check for expiring certificates
Create a reverse proxy for my Node.js app on port 3000
Diagnose why my-site.com is not loading
Show me the current NGINX status and recent events
